nodes.text: Pitt Onoran was a male human who served the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the lead-up to the Galactic Civil War. Initially a logistics officer with the Grand Army of the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars, he later joined the Rebel Alliance during the reign of the Galactic Empire, and with the rank of general headed the Rebel Alliance Special Forces division attached to the unit on Yavin 4's Base One. He, along with Taidu Sefla, provided a report to Mon Mothma on the capabilities of various ground vehicles available to the Alliance. He also supplied a document with his assessment of the Imperial Military's ground assault vehicles.
